overview:
Shruti Mechatronics

Established in the year 2005, We, Shruti Mechatronics, are a highly reputed exporter, whole-seller, retailer and buyer-company engaged in offering Industrial Electronic Devices and Spare-Parts Components. We source these electronic items from reliable vendors, located in India and abroad. Owing to various electrical properties, our range is widely used by the clients in textile mills, electroplating, automation, engineering, and other industries.

We are a distinguished whole-seller, exporter and retailer of Industrial Electronic Devices and Spare Parts. Our product range comprises IC, Transistor, Resistor, SMD Items, Toropot, MOSFET , TRIAC , DIAC , IGBT , GTO , Auto Diode , Transformer, & LED, Power Modules, Bridge Rectifier, and Special Battery. Apart from this, we also offer Diode, SCR/Thyristor, Welding Modules, IGBT Modules, Capsule/Round Diode, Capsule/Round Thyristor, and Dynamic Breaking Resistor(DBR). These products are widely used in many industrial applications. Our range is sourced from industry leading brands, which are reckoned for manufacturing excellent quality electrical products.

Features:

Reliable
Good electrical characteristics
High performance

We have built our reputation as a credible trader and exporter, based on our product quality and services. Since we deal in various major national and international markets, our quality controllers and procuring agents make sure that no leniency is allowed in the product quality. These industry experts thoroughly inspect the products at the time of taking delivery and before the orders are dispatched after packaging. Further, our appropriate packaging solutions and capacious warehouse assist us in safely storing the products before the orders are transported. Assuring highest quality of our products and services, we provide service, replacement and maintenance of spare parts. Clients are highly satisfied with our quality control strategies and quality management system.
